title: First Steps
description: Child takes their first independent steps without support.

title: First Words
description: Child says their first recognizable words like 'mama' or 'papa'.

title: Crawling
description: Child crawls on hands and knees to move around.

title: Potty Training
description: Child uses potty consistently during the day.

title: Drawing Shapes
description: Child can draw basic shapes like circles, squares, and triangles.

title: Counting to 20
description: Child can count aloud from 1 to 20 correctly.

title: Writing Name
description: Child can write their own name legibly.

title: Tying Shoelaces
description: Child learns to tie their own shoelaces independently.

title: Reading Simple Sentences
description: Child can read simple sentences and short stories independently.

title: Basic Math Operations
description: Child can perform simple addition and subtraction (up to 20).

title: Riding a Bicycle
description: Child can ride a bicycle without training wheels.

title: Following Multi-step Instructions
description: Child can follow complex instructions with 3-4 steps.
